QuestData.Title: Is Your Oil Running?
QuestData.Description: Last time we had an oil leak this bad, the oil itself tried to get away!$B$BI don't know what does it, maybe all the demon goop floating around here, but when we get a big enough crude leak half of it globs together and tries to run away.$B$BThat's profit trying to escape! Go run after those oil sludges and bring back their sweet, precious oil!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 10 Crude Tarballs from Oily Sludges.
QuestData.CompletionText: That stuff better not still be moving when you bring it back here.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank goodness the oil is safe! Well done, $n.
